mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY regdate) rn, gseq, title, content, image, regdate, count FROM gongzi) WHERE rn <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.rowsPerPage} AND rn > (#{criteria.pageNum}-1) * #{criteria.rowsPerPage} ORDER BY regdate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE gongzi SET count = #{count}+1 WHERE gseq=#{gseq}
mapper.select: SELECT count FROM gongzi WHERE gseq=#{gseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oneone(onseq, title, content, id, rep) VALUES(oneone_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{id}, 'n')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM oneone WHERE id=#{id} AND onseq=#{onseq}
SELECT * FROM oneone WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY onseq DESC
